title: [K-12] Quantum Computing Leadership Intensive Course: Simulation-based Practical Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in computer engineering/physics and basic linear algebra concepts
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized VR simulation tools, structured around real-world case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core quantum computing concepts (qubits, superposition, entanglement) by connecting them to practical case studies.
Learners can implement basic computational processes by performing quantum circuit simulations in a mobile VR environment.
A framework can be applied to evaluate the feasibility of adopting quantum computing technology when establishing corporate strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
